title: Alpha client in game icon
body: So I've logged onto the Alpha client and in the new patch notes it said all players who logged onto the client get an icon. I was wondering why I haven't gotten it yet / if Riot's even released it yet.

replies.body: Me too I haven't received that icon. I checked this morning

I don't believe the icons have been distributed since the event to receive it hasn't finished just yet.   [6.22 patch notes ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-622-notes#patch-league-client-update) says that testers have until the 15th, so I'd hang on until then.  

https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/articles/2016/november/pn622/client_alpha_icon.jpg

Hope that helps!
